resources.string: CREATE TABLE "bill" ("txId" CHAR PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL DEFAULT (null) ,"orderDate" CHAR,"orderTime" CHAR,"OutOrIn" CHAR,"isPaid" CHAR,"isMealOut" CHAR,"dollar" VARCHAR,"seat" VARCHAR,"feature" VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE "meal" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL ,"txId" CHAR NOT NULL DEFAULT (null) ,"name" VARCHAR NOT NULL ,"spcailize" VARCHAR,"dollar" VARCHAR DEFAULT (0) ,"number" VARCHAR DEFAULT (0) );
CREATE TABLE "food" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL , "stateId" VARCHAR,"name" VARCHAR,"dollar" VARCHAR)
CREATE TABLE "State"("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL ,"name" VARCHAR,"dollar" VARCHAR);
